statements: DELETE FROM device_usage_report WHERE patient_id = 500 AND usage_end_timestamp < '2022-06-01';
DELETE FROM device_usage_report WHERE report_id = 100 AND patient_id = 500;
DELETE FROM device_usage_report WHERE usage_duration > 60 AND effectiveness_rating < 0.7;
DELETE FROM device_usage WHERE device_id = 1 AND user_id = 100;
DELETE FROM report_data WHERE (device_id = 2 OR user_id = 200) AND report_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM reports WHERE report_type = 'daily' AND report_date = '2022-08-15';
DELETE FROM device_usage WHERE device_id = 123 AND usage_type = 'Maintenance';
DELETE FROM patient_care WHERE care_type = 'Emergency' AND responsible_nurse_id = 456;
